title: Q-Methodology-Based Workshop for School Principalsâ€™ Leadership and Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pedagogy and foundational awareness of teacher professional development (PD) concepts
context.additional_context: Online course for pre-service and in-service teachers to explore principals' roles and effective PD strategies using Q-methodology and focus group discussions to facilitate peer interaction

learning_goals: The principal can explain three core strategies to contribute to teachers' professional development (PD).
The process of analyzing teacher PD effectiveness using Q-methodology can be applied to real-world cases.
A PD design plan linked to mathematics curriculum can be developed based on data collected through focus group interviews.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
